name: Nekodatchi
description:
Pet! Clean! Get in the marvellous world of living with a cat! You better treat him or her better that you would treat yourself... or they will leave. Experience all these incredibly activities you can do with your cat and behold what type of cat you might grow while you share your love. All of it as simple as early games just with your mouse and some clicks you can take care of you cat... could you?

This is a submission for Minijam 80: Cats, which limitation is 8x8 Textures. We really hope you enjoy this game as much as we did making it. Thanks and welcome!
